title: Swirls
description: Sixteen-year-old Julia finds herself leaving her London life behind her to move with her parents to the Amazon jungle. A native descendant, she becomes familiarized with her own roots for the first time in her life. However, she never imagines she is about to discover much more than her own past but also just how crowded our little planet isâ€¦ This is a present time sci-fi/ fantasy story about trust, friendship, love and self-discovery. This book falls into the category of YA fiction, though not unsuitable for younger readers.
author: F.A. Hershey
